about_the_game:
Synopsis:

While carrying out your usual heist, you end up locked in a house filled to the roof with traps with a serial killer ready to stab you in the neck with his butcher knife. Be stealthy and get what you came here for, and find a way out!

Info:

House of 1000 Traps is a survival-horror game in where you are a thief who's out for a heist into a rich home.
But things go wildly out of your hands when you get inside the house. As you begin scavenging the area you quickly realise, you're not alone.
A maniac is here with you, and you just interrupted his pleasure night. He filled the house with death traps, and killed the whole family.

The doors are shut tight, the windows barred, you've stepped into his playground just in time so he's not getting bored...
Will you find a way out? , will you leave empty-handed? , will you leave at all...
Be quick, or be dead!

The game is in first-person perspective and is inspired mostly by slasher movies. It aims for an N64 style aesthetic, but will also feature more modern options settings/effects.

Hide and be quiet, or run and hope for the best, the choice is yours... but don't think there's an easy way out.
He will listen, he will seek, and he will find you.

Features:

  • Scavenge the immense house to find all kinds of items that can be used for different purposes, use items to lure and distract enemies, for example.
  • Try to survive a serial killer in a house filled with traps in this survival horror game. He won't mind running & jumping through his own traps to get you.
  • Stay quiet, be sneaky, hide if necessary but don't stay in sight! If he spots you, chances are.. you'll get murdered.
  • Use your flashlight with caution, you will be much more visible with the light on.
